name: Government
description: A member of a recognized government with official status.

name: Transparent
description: Always means exactly what he or she says.

name: Apocalyptic
description: Believes the end of humanity is nigh and wishes others to do so.

name: Aware
description: Particularly skilled at detecting other councillors.

name: Beloved
description: Popular regardless of their loyalties.

name: Hard Target
description: Will strike back if attacked.

name: Streetwise
description: Skilled at navigating dark corners in his or her home nation.

name: Untouchable
description: In too important a position to be safely deleted.

name: Veteran
description: A former member of his or her home nation's armed forces.

name: Ace Assassin
description: An efficient killer.

name: Vengeful
description: It's payback time.

name: Quick Learner
description: Picks up new skills faster than most.

name: Striver
description: Dedicated to self-improvement.

name: Survivor
description: Very hard to kill during episodes of mass violence.

name: Crew
description: Has a small team of loyal followers who serve as bodyguards and can conduct operations.

name: Counselor
description: Appeals to what we have in common.

name: Unifier
description: Influential in nations with a sense of common purpose.

name: Affluent
description: Makes a good living.

name: Prosperous
description: Well-off and able to contribute meaningful funds to the cause.

name: Wealthy
description: Has access to a hefty bank account.

name: Astronomer
description: An expert in the study of Space Science.

name: Chemist
description: An expert in the study of Materials.

name: Doctor
description: An expert in the study of Life Science.

name: Physicist
description: An expert in the study of Energy.

name: Computer Scientist
description: An expert in a study of Information Science.

name: Military Scientist
description: An expert in the study of Military Science.

name: Social Scientist
description: An expert in the study of Social Science.

name: Connected
description: Able to use back channels to exert a measure of influence.

name: Puppet Master
description: Able to pull strings in many places without notice.

name: Low Profile
description: Skilled at evading detection.

name: Undercover
description: This person's public persona conceals someone who is able to infiltrate enemy space installations without fear of identification.

name: Agitator
description: Excels at gaining the support of those unhappy with their nation.
